member.name: T:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceStatusEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for an event that is raised by the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control after a data operation has completed.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceStatusEventArgs.#ctor(System.Data.Common.DbCommand,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceStatusEventArgs class, using the specified System.Data.Common.DbCommand affected by the database operation.
member.param: The System.Data.Common.DbCommand that represents the database query, command, or stored procedure that is submitted to the database by the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control.
An System.Exception thrown by the database operation, if applicable.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions thrown by the database during a data operation.
member.returns: A System.Exception that wraps any exceptions thrown by the database in its System.Exception.InnerException property.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ExceptionHandled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception thrown by the database has been handled.
member.returns: true if an exception thrown by the database has been handled and should not be thrown by the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Command
member.summary: Gets the database command submitted to the database.
member.returns: The System.Data.Common.DbCommand object that represents the database command submitted to the database.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the ADO.NET provider–specific connection string that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control uses to connect to an underlying database.
member.returns: A .NET Framework data provider–specific string that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource uses to connect to the SQL database that it represents. The default is an empty string ("").

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.DataIdField
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the field that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control uses to identify data records.
member.returns: The name that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource uses to identify data root records.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.DataMemberField

member.returns: The name that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource uses to identify the data member of data records.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the field that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control uses to identify parent data records.
member.returns: The name that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource uses to identify parent data root records.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.DataRootMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control uses to identify data root records.
member.returns: One of the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceDataRootMode values. The default is the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceDataRootMode.Auto value.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.DataRootParentIdValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the string value that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control uses to identify data root records.
member.returns: The string value that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource uses to identify data root records.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.FilterExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied after the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource retrieves the data.
member.returns: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.FilterParameters
member.summary: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders that are in the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.FilterExpression string.
member.returns: A System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.FilterExpression property.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.EnableCaching
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control has data caching enabled.
member.returns: true if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.SelectCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL string that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource control uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.
member.returns: An SQL string or the name of a stored procedure that the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource uses to retrieve data.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.SelectCommandType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.SelectCommand property is an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure.
member.returns: One of the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceCommandType values. The default is the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSourceCommandType.Text value.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.SelectParameters
member.summary: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.SelectCommand property to retrieve data from the underlying database.
member.returns: A System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection that contains the parameters used by the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource.SelectCommand property.

member.summary: Gets or sets a sort expression that is applied after the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlHierarchicalDataSource retrieves the data.
member.returns: A string that represents a sorting expression applied when data is retrieved using the Silos.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.

member.name: T:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView
member.summary: Mostra in una tabella i valori di un'origine dati. Ogni colonna rappresenta un campo e ogni record una riga. Permette di selezionare, paginare e ordinare i dati.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.#ctor
member.summary: Inizializza un’istanza della classe TableView senza argomenti.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.ClearSelection
member.summary: Annulla la selezione delle righe.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.GetSelectedDataKeys
member.summary: Ottiene l’insieme di oggetti DataKey che rappresentano i valori della chiave primaria associati alle righe selezionate.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.GetSelectedIndexes
member.summary: Ottiene l’insieme degli inidici delle righe selezionate.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.PageIndexChanging
member.summary: Si verifica quando sta per cambiare l’indice di pagina.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.RowCommand
member.summary: Si verifica quando un evento Command viene generato all’interno del controllo.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SelectIndexChanging
member.summary: Si verifica quando sta per cambiare l’indice di riga selezionato.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SelectIndexChanged
member.summary: Si verifica dopo che è cambiato l’indice di riga selezionato.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SortExpressionChanging
member.summary: Si verifica quando sta per cambiare l’espressione di ordinamento.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.RowDataBound
member.summary: Si verifica dopo che un riga è stata associata ai dati.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.DataKeyNames
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta l’elenco contenente i nomi dei campi di chiave primaria.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.DataVirtualCount
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta il numero delle righe totali di dati. Utilizzato nel caso di paginazione personalizzata.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.Columns
member.summary: Ottiene l’insieme di oggetti DataControlField che rappresentano le colonne in un controllo TableView.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.AllowPaging
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la paginazione di dati è permessa.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.EnableCustomPaging
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la paginazione dei dati è personalizzata. Il codice client si occupa di paginare i dati.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.PageIndex
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta l’indice della pagina di dati da visualizzare.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.PagerSettings
member.summary: Ottiene un oggetto PagerSettings attraverso cui modificare le impostazioni dell’interfaccia di paginazione.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.PageSize
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta il numero di righe di dati da visualizzare.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.Rows
member.summary: Ottiene l’insieme di oggetti TableViewRow che rappresentano le righe in un controllo TableView.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.AllowMultipleRowSelection
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è permessa la selezione di più righe.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.EnableSelectByDataKey
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il mantenimento della selezione avviene tramite associazione con il campo chiave primaria o tramite l’indice di riga.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SelectedIndex
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta la riga selezionata tramite l’indice di riga.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SelectedDataKey
member.summary: Ottiene l’oggetto DataKey che rappresenta il valore del campo chiave primaria associato alla riga selezionata.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.AllowSorting
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l’ordinamento dei dati è permesso.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.EnableCustomSorting
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l’ordinamento dei dati è personalizzato. Il codice client si occupa di ordinare i dati.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.EnableMultipleColumnSorting
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l’ordinamento su più colonne è abilitato.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SorterSettings
member.summary: Ottiene un oggetto SorterSettings attraverso cui modificare le impostazioni dell’interfaccia di ordinamento.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.TableView.SortExpression
member.summary: Ottiene o imposta l’espressione di ordinamento.

member.name: T:ElogToolkit.Parse
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a base data type to the equivalent base data type.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Parse.ToDateTimeOrDefault(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its DateTime equivalent or returns the specified default value if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing a date and time to convert.
A date and time to be returned if the conversion fails.
member.returns: A DateTime structure that contains the value that was parsed or the specified default value if the conversion failed.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Parse.ToDateTimeOrDefault(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its DateTime equivalent using the specified formatting styles, or returns the specified default value if the conversion fails.
member.param: A string containing a date and time to convert.
A date and time to be returned if the conversion fails.
A bitwise combination of enumeration values that defines how to interpret the parsed date in relation to the current time zone or the current date.
member.returns: A DateTime structure that contains the value that was parsed or the specified default value if the conversion failed.

member.name: T:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource
member.summary: Represents a data source control that provides data to data-bound controls through events to be handled by the client code.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.GetView(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
member.param: The name of the view to retrieve. Because the supports only one view, viewName is ignored.
member.returns: The named DefaultView that is associated with the .

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.GetViewNames
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the object.
member.returns: An that contains the names of the views associated with the .

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.CanPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client code will handle paging through the data rows.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client code will handle retrieving the total number of data rows.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.CanSort
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client code will handle sorting through the data.

member.name: E:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource.SelectData
member.summary: Occurs when a select operation is requested.

member.name: T:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceView
member.summary: Supports the control. Represents a single data view.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceView.#ctor(ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSource,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that the is associated with.
A unique name for the data source view, within the scope of the data source control that owns it.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)
member.summary: Retrieves data by raising the SelectData event of the associated control.
member.param: A used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
member.returns: A list of data rows.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceView.CanPage
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the object supports paging through data.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the object supports retrieving the total number of data rows.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the object supports sorting through data.

member.summary: Provides data for the SelectData event of the control.

member.name: M:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceSelectDataEventArgs.#ctor(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)
member.summary: Initializes new instance of the class
member.param: A that specifies which additional data-related operations the client code handling the associated event should perform, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceSelectDataEventArgs.Arguments
member.summary: Provides a mechanism that the object can use to request data-related operations when data is retrieved.

member.name: P:ElogToolkit.Web.UI.WebControls.SimpleObjectDataSourceSelectDataEventArgs.DataSource
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for the client code handling the associated event to pass the retrieved data back to the object.
